ontologySet.name: names
ontologySet.documentation: The full name(s) of the data variable(s) in a comma-seperated list (e.g 'Behavioral Measurement,Gastric Mill Neuron').

ontologySet.name: variableNames
ontologySet.documentation: The shortened name(s) of the data variable(s) in a comma-seperated list (e.g 'behaviorMeasure,GM_neuron'). Must be valid MATLAB variable names.

ontologySet.name: ontologyNodes
ontologySet.documentation: The ontology node id(s) of the data variable (s) in a comma-seperated list of ontology:nodeID (e.g 'EMPTY:00000090,UBERON:3373').

ontologySet.name: data
ontologySet.documentation: A structure with variableNames as fields and arrays of corresponding data as values.
